The Happiness Hunter

Overview

Fiona Redding is the Founder of The Happiness Hunter ‑ Through the The Happiness Hunter framework, people can learn practical steps for change, receive ongoing support and accountability, and be part of an incredibly supportive community to help them sustain their change.

Role

Management of social media calendar, copyrighting and scheduling. Graphic design tasks have included Digital graphics for socials, EDM Template, Presentation and booklet templates, sub brand logo development.
